wikipedia_page.main: Adam Herbert Wakenshaw VC (9 June 1914 – 27 June 1942) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: |Pte Adam Herbert Wakenshaw||9th||27 June 1942||Mersa Matruh, Egypt
